attributes.contentHtml:
part 1: plexed.

Ah yes our dearest abuser PLEXED, Dont everyone love him for the crimes he has commited and for the bullshit hosts he has made? With all of his abused hetzner accounts?
Isnt that awesome? Him destroying innocent users data with no care in the world? Him manipulating all of his users even STAFF!
Plexed isnt a good person we all know that, And if you are apart of his scummy bussiness i will DESPISE YOU UNTIL I FUCKING DIE!
First plexed makes a crappy host
Gets users
Gets an abused hetzner account
Repeat

Plexed is the dumbest little shit alive, He shouldnt even be alive he mustve been born by mistake, His the biggest reason parents should consider using condoms.
And I WILL find a way to get him off the hosting industry FOREVER, No matter what it will TAKE!
I wanna see his life slowly get ruined for the mess he has created in the hosting industry.
And i know im not a great guy too, but atleast i dont abuse anymore u can even ask io.netty for payment proof of me paying for my dedicateds.

Part 1 is COMPLETED! Part 2 should be longer and WILL contain much more history about plexed and his crappy hosts! and i will go after every single FUCKING host in cyperia v2!

attributes.title: Cyperia V2 "another shitty hosting group made by plexed"
